abstract: Day three of the Rajat Gupta insider trading trail kicked off with testimony from a former trader at Raj Rajaratnam’s hedge fund Galleon Group.
snippet: Day three of the Rajat Gupta insider trading trail kicked off with testimony from a former trader at Raj Rajaratnam’s hedge fund Galleon Group.
lead_paragraph: On the evening of Sept. 23, 2008, just before 6 p.m., Goldman Sachs announced that Warren E. Buffett had invested $5 billion in the bank. The vote of confidence from the billionaire investor was great news for Goldman and for the broader stock market, coming at a time of chaos and fear in the financial world.

headline.main: Rajaratnam’s Goldman Trade a Focus at Gupta Trial
